content:
Hi all, just starting here...
Sorry cannot install 5.9 due to 'missing dependencies' error, so cannot help with screenshots.
I am happy to proof read and perhaps try to streamline the pages that are too verbose.

Easier navigation suggestions:

  1. every page should have a 'Back to top' up arrow that resides on the bottom right corner. Nobody enjoys scrolling back up on long pages.
  2. every page should have a 'Next <name of topic>' green hyperlink at the very end.

Yes, this is something we have to program for, probably with php. I am not skilled at that but we can inquire at the Dokuwiki website on their forum. https://www.dokuwiki.org/dokuwiki Stefano, I have made an account there and have used and contributed to the discussions. Perhaps you could make an account and inquire and follow up?

I got two replies:
The Dokuwiki has a "Top" arrow in the bottom right if one hoover on it it says "Back to top", and it does.... I missed it earlier on.

Another answer is:
The Bootstrap3 template (and other templates) also supports this for mobile devices.
Since this is a template, the function will go to each end every page.

Stefano, that's good. We have been using the standard default template, to make sure that everytning works including export to PDF (I've been partially successful, but am still missing sub-level pages and links)

When this is done, we will likely be switching back to Bootstrap3 template for several reasons.

Thanks!
